title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971 - When performing the 'copy package' operation in the 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' module from the 'jdt.ui3' package, the destination is being set as 'xxx'.
OB: When performing the 'copy package' operation in module 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' from package 'jdt.ui3', the destination is set as 'xxx' instead of the expected value.
EB: The destination should be set as 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' module.
2. Navigate to the 'jdt.ui3' package.
3. Perform the 'copy package' operation.
4. Verify that the destination is set as 'xxx' instead of 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
